name: Web Racer Online
description:
A Retro Mario Kart SNES racer that can be played in a browser just look at download instructions to find out how to play it in your browser.

Use arrow keys or WASD to control the car, space also brakes. If you tap the break while turning at speed your car will start to slide... If you can control it then you can get round tighter bends at speed.
